name.ja: <ruby>漆<rt>しっ</rt></ruby><ruby>黒<rt>こく</rt></ruby><ruby>波<rt>は</rt></ruby><ruby>導<rt>どう</rt></ruby><ruby>刀<rt>とう</rt></ruby><ruby>鬼<rt>おに</rt></ruby><ruby>丸<rt>まる</rt></ruby>クニツナ

effect.en: If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage (if the ATK of the attacking monster exceeds the DEF of the attack target, inflict the difference). Face-up Fish Type monsters on your field cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects.

materials.en: "Surging-Wave Swordsman Onimaru Kunituna" + "Hydro Gun Mini Bluefin"
